trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Elmira
There were 2 other sightings in Elmira on or around July 5th 2009
divs: sighting detailscaught the ufo in my pictures while at a fireworks display! didnt know it till i went to edit\ delete the photos that didnt turn out!!!! i reported it to mr davenport and no one seems the slightest bit interested!! i spoke with him years ago and told him they would be back. ths is the second one the first was prob late 70's and within 75 feet. everyone thinks i am nuts and i had 2 witnesses the first time!!! sorry no photo attached sent it to too many already.. mark
Summary: caught the ufo in my pictures while at a fireworks display
